name: ai-affiliate-marketing-system
description: AI-Automated Affiliate Marketing System with MCP Integration

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=backend && npm install --workspace=frontend && npm install --workspace=mcp-servers/operations && npm install --workspace=mcp-servers/content && npm install --workspace=mcp-servers/analytics && npm install --workspace=mcp-servers/automation && npm install --workspace=mcp-servers/integrations
scripts.dev:mcp: npm run dev --workspace=mcp-servers/operations & npm run dev --workspace=mcp-servers/content & npm run dev --workspace=mcp-servers/analytics & npm run dev --workspace=mcp-servers/automation & npm run dev --workspace=mcp-servers/integrations
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:mcp"
scripts.build:mcp: npm run build --workspace=mcp-servers/operations && npm run build --workspace=mcp-servers/content && npm run build --workspace=mcp-servers/analytics && npm run build --workspace=mcp-servers/automation && npm run build --workspace=mcp-servers/integrations
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:mcp
scripts.start:mcp: npm run start --workspace=mcp-servers/operations & npm run start --workspace=mcp-servers/content & npm run start --workspace=mcp-servers/analytics & npm run start --workspace=mcp-servers/automation & npm run start --workspace=mcp-servers/integrations
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:mcp"
scripts.db:migrate: cd database && psql $DATABASE_URL -f migrations/001_initial_schema.sql && psql $DATABASE_URL -f migrations/002_create_views.sql
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
